group:
Goals for the Course
There are a variety of different goals that we have in mind for this course.
introduce students to useful technologies that are commonly used in real data analysis for processing data, performing EDA and generating reports.
be able to understand the alternatives and issues and the available technologies when thinking about an overall problem
think about the process in which statistics is just a part,
be able to perform computations in one or more languages or using different tools.
